name: Random Dino Game
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION

Beware of the intimidating Cactus, the natural predator to the random Dino.
Keep your focus as the Cactus gets faster as time progresses!

We decided to make a quick game in 2 hours just to get more used to collaboration

CONTROLS

SPACE - Jump

CREDITS

Art - Raza Khan
Developer - Bix Men
